com.ece.superkids.users

Class FileUserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ece.superkids.users.FileUserManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserManager

    public class FileUserManager
extends Object
implements UserManager
    The FileUserManager class is an interface for the UserManager class. It has functions to add, delete, update and get users.
    Author:
    Marc Adam
